revision.text: The [[Egg#Egg Pool Odds|Egg Pool Odds]] works as follows: * There is a 50% chance of obtaining a Pokémon from the furthest region you've been to (odds split evenly for each possible Pokémon from the furthest region reached) * The Remaining 50% is split among all previous egg pool Pokémon, favoring the more recent regions. See the [[Egg#Egg Pool Odds|Egg Pool Odds]] section below for more specific details. * Neither hatching an Egg in a particular region, nor obtaining an egg from a particular region, has any affect on what Regional Egg Pool the egg will pull the hatched Pokémon from.
